job_description:
Junior Geophysicist - Fiber-optic Sensing & AI (Fresher)

We are seeking a motivated Junior Geophysicist (recent graduate) to dive into projects involving Distributed Acoustic Sensing (DAS), fiber‑optic sensor data, and Python‑driven AI analysis. You’ll work closely with geophysicists, data scientists, and engineers to drive data‑centric insights and support field deployments.

Key Responsibilities

  • Support data acquisition, preprocessing, and interpretation from fiber‑optic sensing systems (DAS/DTS).
  • Analyze large time‑series datasets using Python (NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Matplotlib).
  • Collaborate with AI/ML experts to build models for signal classification, event detection, or anomaly identification.
  • Participate in field activities, including deploying sensors, monitoring systems, and validating datasets.
  • Document workflows, results, and technical insights clearly in reports or code comments.

Required Qualifications

  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Geophysics, Geoscience, Physics, Engineering, or related discipline.
  • Fundamental understanding of seismic wave behavior and fiber‑optic sensing principles.
  • Basic proficiency in Python and experience with data‑analysis libraries.
  • Interest in machine learning—any exposure to scikit‑learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch is a plus.
  • Excellent analytical thinking, communication skills, and collaborative mindset.

Preferred (Nice-to-Have)

  • Experience with signal processing, time‑series analysis, or seismic inversion methods.
  • Familiarity with version control systems (e.g., Git) and Jupyter notebooks.
  • Willingness and physical ability to participate in occasional fieldwork and travel.

What You’ll Gain

  • Hands‑on experience at the intersection of geophysics, fiber‑optic sensing, and AI.
  • Mentorship from industry professionals and cross‑disciplinary collaboration.
  • Exposure to real‑world problems in energy, infrastructure, and environmental monitoring.

If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at lakshmi@team.tranzmeo.com
summary: Seeking a Junior Geophysicist for fiber-optic sensing and AI projects. Responsibilities include data analysis and model building, with opportunities for field deployment and learning.

job_description:
Infosec L2 Security Analyst (Security Operations Center - Advanced)

Job Position: Infosec L2 Security Analyst (Security Operations Center - Advanced) Location: From Kochi Office (Onsite) Company Location: Kochi

Preferring Male Candidates

Job Summary: The L2 Security Analyst is responsible for performing advanced incident analysis, investigating security escalations from L1 analysts, conducting vulnerability assessments, and actively supporting threat hunting and malware analysis. This role acts as a critical link within the SOC by coordinating incident response efforts, ensuring compliance with security frameworks, and enhancing the organization's cybersecurity posture through diligent monitoring and remediation activities.

Key Responsibilities:

  • Monitor, analyze, and respond to alerts generated by firewalls, proxy servers, and intrusion detection/prevention systems (IDS/IPS).
  • Perform rule tuning and assist in configuration adjustments of firewall, proxy, and IDS devices.
  • Handle escalations from L1 analysts and conduct in-depth investigations of security incidents and alerts.
  • Perform comprehensive log analysis, root cause analysis, threat hunting and forensic examinations.
  • Coordinate with stakeholders across IT, security, and business units to implement incident response and remediation.
  • Execute vulnerability assessments using tools like Nessus and Qualys; manage patching activities in coordination with relevant teams.
  • Participate in continuous threat hunting exercises and malware analysis to identify emerging threats.
  • Ensure adherence to security policies, standards, and regulatory frameworks such as ISO 27001, PCI DSS, and GDPR.
  • Maintain and update incident response playbooks; contribute to SOC process improvements.
  • Provide technical guidance and mentoring to L1 analysts.
  • Prepare detailed incident reports and documentation for stakeholders.

Required Experience and Qualifications:

  • 2 to 5 years of experience in cybersecurity operations, SOC, or IT infrastructure security.
  • Proven expertise with SIEM platforms (e.g., Splunk, QRadar), endpoint protection, and threat detection solutions.
  • Hands-on experience with vulnerability management tools such as Nessus, Qualys, or equivalent.
  • Familiarity with regulatory standards and compliance requirements (ISO 27001, PCI DSS, GDPR preferred).
  • Relevant security certifications such as CEH, CompTIA Security+, or equivalent are highly desirable.
  • Strong analytical, problem-solving skills, and attention to detail.
  • Effective communication skills with ability to liaise across technical and non-technical teams.

Preferred Skills:

  • Knowledge of malware analysis and computer forensic techniques.
  • Experience with scripting languages (Python, Bash) for automation and security tool enhancement.
  • Understanding of network security protocols and firewall management.
  • Ability to work collaboratively under pressure in a fast-paced, 24/7 operational environment.

Contact Information: If this opportunity aligns with your career goals, kindly share your updated resume with us at chandini.m@arttechgroup.com
summary: Advanced L2 Security Analyst needed for SOC in Kochi. Responsibilities include incident analysis, threat hunting, and vulnerability assessments.

job_description:
MLOps Engineer

Brief Description

Trois Infotech is building a robust DevOps, MLOps, and DataOps team to test, validate, and deploy production-grade Computer Vision and AI pipelines. This team will manage pipelines across a diverse range of hardware, from low-power edge devices (Jetson Orin, Hailo-8/15) to high-performance multi-GPU data-center nodes. As a senior member of this team reporting to the CTO, you will need to demonstrate mastery in DevOps, MLOps, and DataOps, with a strong understanding of hardware capabilities.

Purpose of the Role

As a junior member of the team, your primary function will be to support the transition of AI/ML artifacts from research and development (R&D) to production environments. Key contributions will include:

  • Assisting with comprehensive functional testing, encompassing unit, integration, and regression tests.
  • Supporting the validation of models against critical performance metrics such as latency, throughput, and accuracy.
  • Contributing to the path-to-production process through tasks related to containerization, CI/CD implementation, and system monitoring.

Role Focus and Time Allocation

  • Focus: Your work will be concentrated on edge testing, edge deployment, automated regression, and release operations.
  • Time Allocation:
    • Testing: 60%
    • Deployment & Ops: 40%

Responsibilities

In this entry-level role, you will learn and apply the following under the guidance of senior team members:

Build & Packaging: - Edge: Assist with tools like TensorRT, ONNX, and Hailo NN-Converter. - Server / Data-Center: Work with Yocto / Ubuntu Core images. - Cross-Cutting: Utilize Docker/OCI containers, assist in packaging testing environments, and work with Git-versioned artifacts.

Functional & Model Validation: - Edge: Support model quantization and calibration tasks. - Server / Data-Center: Assist in running fairness tests. - Cross-Cutting: Work with regression datasets managed in DVC.

Performance & Power Testing: - Edge: Employ tools for Jetson power-profiling and assist in thermal testing. - Server / Data-Center: Support bandwidth and saturation tests. - Cross-Cutting: Help measure and report latency and throughput.

Preferred Skills

We are seeking candidates with a foundational skill set and a strong eagerness to learn. Basic familiarity with performance testing and Docker/Kubernetes deployments is required.

Modern C++ (17/20/23): - Basic CMake skills and familiarity with gdb.

AI Runtimes – C++ APIs: - ONNX Runtime (C++): Ability to run sample applications. - TensorRT (C++): Experience with trtexec. - NVIDIA Triton: Capable of deploying a prebuilt model. - DeepStream (C/C++): Ability to run the reference application.

Edge & Embedded Tool-chain: - Jetson (L4T): Proficient with ssh and tegrastats. - Hailo-8/15: Able to run samples. - Intel ARC / OpenVINO: Can run basic hello_query_device.

Build & Packaging (C++): - CMake: Can build from a given README file. - Conan / vcpkg: Able to install dependencies. - Cross-compilation: Can use prebuilt images.

Performance & Profiling: - CPU: Familiar with htop. - GPU: Familiar with nvidia-smi.

Testing C++ Pipelines: - Unit / Integration: Can write simple assert statements for testing. - Regression & KPI: Able to run scripts, collate data and KPIs, and report them to the R&D team.

DataOps & Telemetry: - gRPC / ZeroMQ C++: Can run example code. - Logging & Tracing: Can use printf for logging.

Experience

  • 3-5 years of experience.
  • Solid C++ coursework or open-source contributions (please provide proof via GitHub links).
summary: Join Trois Infotech as an MLOps Engineer. Support AI/ML pipeline deployment from R&D to production, focusing on testing and operations.

job_description:
Computer Vision & Augmented Reality R&D Engineer

Company: iBoson Innovations (P) Ltd Location: ACE 1, 3rd Floor, CDAC Building, Technopark Campus, Kazhakootam, Thiruvananthapuram, 695581 Website: http://www.iboson.io Closing Date: 30 September 2025 Job Published: 21 September 2025 Contact Email: career@ibosoninnov.com

Brief Description

We are seeking highly motivated R&D Engineers specializing in Computer Vision and Augmented Reality to design, prototype, and optimize next-generation visual computing solutions. The role involves pushing the boundaries of 3D perception, real-time tracking, and AR interaction through a combination of algorithm research, system design, and hands-on development.

Key Responsibilities

  • Research, develop, and prototype algorithms for 2D/3D computer vision, including feature detection, descriptor matching, pose estimation, and object recognition.
  • Build and optimize pipelines for 3D reconstruction, point cloud registration, and depth estimation using monocular, stereo, and LiDAR data.
  • Develop AR solutions leveraging ARCore, ARKit, and Unity, including plane detection, meshing, and spatial mapping.
  • Implement and evaluate feature matching and registration techniques (e.g., SIFT, LSD, SuperGlue, RANSAC-based methods) for robust object/scene understanding.
  • Integrate and optimize machine learning models (e.g., quantized and lightweight vision models) for mobile and embedded platforms.
  • Work across multiple platforms (C++, Python, Java, Swift) to bridge research prototypes with production-level applications.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to transform R&D outcomes into deployable solutions.

Preferred Skills

  • Strong background in Computer Vision, 3D Geometry, and Augmented Reality.
  • Proficiency in OpenCV, Open3D, Eigen, and feature-matching frameworks.
  • Hands-on experience with ARCore, ARKit, Unity, and real-time spatial computing.
  • Familiarity with point cloud processing, depth sensing, and reconstruction techniques.
  • Programming expertise in C++, Python, and at least one mobile platform language (Java/Kotlin for Android, Swift for iOS).
  • Knowledge of ML model optimization and quantization for resource-constrained environments.
  • Strong problem-solving and R&D mindset with the ability to prototype and iterate quickly.

Nice-to-Have

  • Experience with neural feature descriptors and transformer-based matching networks.
  • Background in SLAM, visual positioning systems, or optical flow methods.
  • Contributions to open-source CV/AR projects or research publications.

What We Offer

  • Opportunity to work on cutting-edge AR and CV research with real-world impact.
  • Collaborative environment where experimentation and innovation are encouraged.
  • Pathway to publish research, build prototypes, and shape next-gen AR systems.
  • Work on next-generation AR smart glasses.
summary: Seeking R&D Engineers in Computer Vision and AR to develop next-gen visual computing solutions. Requires algorithm research, system design, and hands-on development for 3D perception and AR interactions.

job_description:
HR EXECUTIVE

Company: JOOPIUM TECHNOLOGIES (P) Ltd Location: 4TH FLOOR AMSTOR ANNEXE AMSTOR HOUSE, TECHNOPARK KAZHAKOOTAM TRIVANDRUM, 695581 Website: https://joopiumtechnologies.com Contact Email: careers@joopiumtechnologies.com Closing Date: 10, Oct 2025 Job Published: 20, Sept 2025

Mode: WORK FROM OFFICE

Experience: 1-2 Years

Job Responsibilities:

  1. Recruitment and Hiring:
    • Sourcing and selecting qualified candidates for open positions.
    • Includes job postings, resume screening, conducting interviews, and facilitating the hiring process.
  2. Employee Onboarding and Offboarding:
    • Facilitate the onboarding process for new employees, ensuring they have necessary paperwork, orientation, and training.
    • Manage the offboarding process when employees leave the organization.
  3. Employee Relations:
    • Handle employee relations matters, including conflict resolution, disciplinary actions, and employee grievances.
    • Provide suggestions to promote positive work environments, mediate disputes, and ensure adherence to company policies and employment laws.
  4. Compensation and Benefits:
    • Manage employee compensation and benefits programs.
    • Includes salary administration, bonus plans, employee benefits enrollment, and managing payroll processes.
  5. Performance Management:
    • Implement performance management systems and processes.
    • Involves setting performance goals based on directions from higher management, conducting performance evaluations, providing feedback, and facilitating employee development plans.
  6. Policy Development and Compliance:
    • Develop and communicate company policies and ensure compliance with applicable employment laws and regulations.
    • Educate employees about policies and procedures, maintain employee handbooks, and handle legal and regulatory compliance matters.
  7. Training and Development:
    • Coordinate training and development initiatives to enhance employee skills and knowledge.
    • May include organizing workshops, training sessions, and implementing employee development programs.
  8. Employee Engagement and Retention:
    • Focus on initiatives to enhance employee engagement, satisfaction, and retention.
    • May include organizing workshops, training sessions, and implementing employee development programs.
  9. HR Administration:
    • Handle administrative tasks such as maintaining employee records, managing HR systems and databases, and ensuring employee data confidentiality.
  10. Legal Compliance:
    • Stay updated on employment laws and regulations to ensure compliance.
    • Assist with legal matters, contracts, and workplace investigations.

Preferred Skills:

  • Excellent Communication skills
  • Proven work experience in HR-related fields
  • Experience with full-cycle recruitment

Qualifications:

  • MBA or other HR-related fields
summary: Seeking an HR Executive with 1-2 years of experience for a Work From Office role. Responsibilities include recruitment, onboarding, employee relations, and performance management.

job_description:
Technical Sales Specialist - AI

Company: REIZEND (P) Ltd Location: SBC Module 15, -2 Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark phase 1, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.reizendretail.in

Job Published: 20, Sept 2025 Closing Date: 04, Nov 2025

Contact Email: careers@reizend.ai

Brief Description

We are hiring an AI Sales Specialist to lead the marketing initiatives for our AI products and services and drive business growth. This strategic role requires excellent communication with a great attitude and the ability to set and achieve sales targets. The ideal candidate will have good academics and a results-oriented mind-set.

Responsibilities

  • Develop and implement a strategic sales plan to achieve company sales targets and objectives.
  • Identify new opportunities and potential clients, actively prospecting and generating leads.
  • Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients, understanding their needs and providing tailored solutions to meet their requirements.
  • Develop, execute, and monitor marketing programs for our AI products and services across a variety of channels in line with the GTM strategy derived.
  • Research the market, analyze trends, and provide advice on defining the organization's marketing strategy to effectively reach the target market.
  • Collaborate with internal teams, including product and sales, to develop and monitor strategic marketing initiatives.
  • Analyze and report on the performance and efficiency of marketing campaigns.
  • Create marketing materials, such as sales and product collateral, while ensuring brand guidelines are met.
  • Work with external agencies and vendors to execute marketing programs.
  • Write, proofread, and edit creative and technical content across different mediums to support marketing initiatives.
  • Provide expert advice on branding, positioning, communications, and other marketing issues.
  • Give direction to marketing efforts, utilizing the most effective methods and tools.
  • Stay updated on emerging trends and share best practices, fostering knowledge and insights.

Preferred Skills

  • Strong analytical and problem-solving abilities.
  • Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Excellent Academics.

Compensation

  • 6–11 LPA (Competitive fixed salary & Attractive performance-based incentives & ESOPs)

Qualifications

  • B.Tech in Non-IT disciplines, OR Bachelor’s/Master’s in Mathematics/Statistics, OR Technical degree with MBA

Experience Required

  • 0-3 years
summary: Seeking an AI Sales Specialist to drive marketing initiatives and business growth for AI products. Requires excellent communication, sales target achievement, and strong analytical skills.

job_description:
Junior Technical Support - DevOps

Company: REIZEND (P) Ltd Location: SBC Module 15, -2 Floor, Thejaswini Building, Technopark phase 1, Trivandrum, 695581 Website: http://www.reizendretail.in Contact Email: careers@reizend.ai

Job Published: 20, Sept 2025 Closing Date: 04, Nov 2025

Brief Description

We are looking for a proactive & highly skilled Technical Support Engineer to provide exceptional technical support to overseas projects, working in rotational shifts to ensure 24/7 availability. This role involves troubleshooting complex issues across cloud platforms, networking, application architectures, and DevOps toolchains. The ideal candidate should be self-motivated, a collaborator, agile, and a continuous learner.

Key Responsibilities

  • Provide technical support and troubleshoot issues related to cloud platforms and services such as Fargate, ECS, DynamoDB, BigQuery, SNS etc.
  • Understand problems by consuming logs and metrics from various sources using services such as CloudWatch, Prometheus, Grafana, Loki, Alert Managers, and Splunk etc.
  • Analyze and resolve networking challenges, including load balancers, API gateways, reverse proxies, ingress controllers, and service-to-service communications.
  • Work on issues related to client-server communications, firewalls, and virtual machines.
  • Collaborate with DevOps teams to manage and troubleshoot toolchains like Docker, Kubernetes, Jenkins, Ingress Controllers etc.
  • Act as the first point of contact for technical queries and escalate issues when necessary.
  • Liaise with development and operations teams to identify root causes and resolve incidents effectively.
  • Document troubleshooting steps, solutions, and maintain a knowledge base for recurring issues.
  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement best practices for monitoring and incident response.
  • Participate in shift handovers and provide timely updates on ongoing issues.

Preferred Skills

Cloud Platforms and Services

  • Hands-on knowledge working with Fargate and ECS for managing and troubleshooting containerized workloads.
  • Proficiency with DynamoDB and BigQuery for analyzing data and making decisions based on the analysis.
  • Hands-on knowledge of SNS for debugging message delivery issues and integration workflows.

Monitoring and Logging Tools

  • Proficiency in CloudWatch Logs, Loki, and Splunk for consuming and analyzing logs to identify and resolve issues.
  • Hands-on knowledge with Prometheus and Grafana for analyzing metrics using dashboards and monitoring system health.
  • Knowledge of Alert Manager for configuring and managing alert escalation.
  • Ability to interpret metrics from various sources and create actionable insights.

Networking and Security

  • Understanding of load balancers (e.g., ALB, NLB) for distributing traffic and troubleshooting connectivity issues.
  • Knowledge in API Gateways like AWS API Gateway or NGINX for managing API traffic.
  • Knowledge of reverse proxies and ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX Ingress, Traefik) for managing internal/external traffic.
  • Understanding service-to-service communications, including DNS, HTTP/HTTPS, and gRPC protocols.
  • Hands-on knowledge with firewalls, security groups, and IAM roles for secure communications.
  • Troubleshooting skills for VM-related issues in platforms like AWS EC2 or equivalent.

DevOps Toolchains

  • Proficiency with Docker for managing container images and runtime debugging.
  • Understanding of Kubernetes concepts of managing deployments, ingress setups, and pod-related issues and related troubleshooting commands and mechanisms.
  • Knowledge of CI/CD pipeline building tools such as Jenkins, GitHub Actions, ArgoCD for building, deploying, and managing automated pipelines.
  • Understanding of Ingress controllers (e.g., NGINX, Traefik) and SSL termination for secure routing.

Troubleshooting and Incident Management

  • Strong problem-solving skills to identify root causes using logs, metrics, and system-level debugging.
  • Ability to document detailed troubleshooting steps and solutions for recurring issues.

Collaboration and Communication

  • Ability to work with cross-functional teams (DevOps, development, and operations) to resolve incidents.
  • Skills in effective and proactive communication to escalate issues and provide updates during shift handovers.
  • Proficiency with tools like Slack, JIRA, Confluence, or Google Workspace for collaboration and issue tracking.

Salary Package: 4 - 6 LPA Work Type: Work From Office Location: Trivandrum

Role: Technical Support Engineer with 0.5 - 2 years of experience.
summary: Seeking a Junior Technical Support Engineer with 0.5-2 years of experience. Responsibilities include troubleshooting cloud, networking, and DevOps issues for overseas projects.
